title: Liburan Akhir Minggu

text:
Begini,

Hotel labersa bukan tempat yang memuaskan sebagai tempat meeting, khususnya berskala besar.
Kenapa:
1. Marketing kurang paham akan apa yang dimaui oleh user. Waktu itu kami memberikan skema terkait peserta dan pembagian ruangan versi kami, tapi bagi marketing dia hanya ingin tau jumlah peserta, tgl mulai dan akhir dan jumlah kamar. Untuk detail (bagi kami penting karena nanti akan terkait pelaksanaan) kurang diminati, sehingga kami jadi bertanya tanya.

2. Hitung jumlah piring.
Ketika tiba waktu makan, banyak makanan yg kurang. Ternyata ketika dianalisa faktor yang paling dominan adalah pemakaian jumlah piring makan.
Kami mengerti bila paket meeting dihitung memakai istilah "pax". Tapi penerapannya sangat ketat. Ketika orang mau tambah dwngan mwmakai piring baru, hitingan pax tadi sudah berkurang, ketika makan buah memakai piring nasi, hitungan pax sudah berkurang. Jadi walau makanan masih ada di dapur, bagi mereka (analisa kami), hitungan pax makan sdh berkurang yang artinya makanan juga sudah beekurang. Hahahaha.
Memang ada peserta yg membawa keluarga, akan tetapi bukan sekali ini saja kami melakukan kegiatan di hotel, tapi tidak pernah ada istilah makanan kurang karena hitungan piring berkurang.

3. Pelayanan lambat
Membutuhkan waktu yang lama ketika kita membutuhkan pertolongan dari pihak hotel. Butuh waktu hampir sekitar 20 menit untuk tiba.

Masih ada beberapa hal yang kurang memuaskan didalam pelayanan yang diberikan, tetapi terlalu panjang untuk diceritakan.

Terima kasih
title: Hotel Labersa tidak memuaskan didalam pelayanan

text:
Kemarin baju kemeja saya tertinggal di lemari pas check out. Namun pas saya telp ke hotel trus kasih tau kemeja saya tertinggal, receptionisnya bilang bentar kita cek ya pak, nanti kita hubungi. Saya sudah menunggu dan beberapa kali menelepon kembali, jawabnya hanya itu saja. 

Hingga resepsionisnya ganti baru dikasih tau kalau kemeja saya tidak ada di lemari kamar. Tidak ada upaya untuk mencari tau siapa yg mengambil kemeja itu dari lemari, atau permintaan maaf pun tidak ada disampaikan.

Saya tau persis kalau kemeja itu tinggal di lemari kamar. Harusnya pihak management menegaskan kepada housekeepingnya untuk tidak mengambil barang tamu yg ketinggalan dan harus dititip ke resepsionis. Harga kemeja memang tidak seberapa, namun kemeja itu adalah hadiah dari istri saya. 

Dan pesan saya kepada management, mohon untuk serius mengenai kebersihan kamar. Kemarin teman saya pindah kamar karena lantainya bau. Kemudian kamar mandi kamar saya kemarin air kencing tamu sebelumnya dilantai tidak disiram.

Hotel yang besar. Sebenarnya dekat dengan kota Pekanbaru, namun melewati jalan yang sepi dan jauh dari keramaian dan ternyata hotel ini memang bukan berada di Pekanbaru lagi. Hotel ini benar-benar besar dan bagus hanya saja sedikit sepi. Di hari long weekend saja hanya ada beberapa tamu. 

Kamar sangat bagus dengan karpet tebal dan kasur yang empuk. kamar mandi benar-benar bagus dengan  dinding marmer bathtub yang sangat besar. Perlu ditingkatkan kebersihan karpet di kamar dan agar membersihkan karpet lebih teliti agar jangan ada benda-benda kecil tersisa di karpet.

Suasana hotel sangat tenang. Di depan hotel adalah club Golf yang cukup ramai, tidak seperti hotel yang sepi. Tamu-tamu club golf tidak menginap karena lokasinya memang dekat dengan Pekanbaru. 

Saran saya adalah hotel agar menambahkan kegiatan di hotel untuk menarik pengunjung dan bisa meningkatkan promo untuk tamu-tamu grup. 

Oh iya, kolam renang hotel ini sangat bagus, anak-anak suka sekali berenang di kolam reangnya. Kami juga mendapatkan dua free waterpark ticket.

text:
Dengan predikat sebagai hotel berbintang 5 pastilah hotel ini menjadi daya tarik bagi wisatawan asing yang berkunjung ke Riau. pelayanan yang memuaskan dengan fasilitas spa yang bisa diminta untuk datang ke kamar dan kolam renang. Menu sarapan yang disajikan sangat lengkap, mulai dari yang barat-baratan hingga kue tradisional, bahkan disediakan jamu. Hotel ini juga dekat dengan waterboom sehingga keluarga terutama anak-anak dapat bermain air dengan puas.

Saya telah berekspektasi tinggi ketika saya mencoba untuk menginap di hotel ini. Setelah mengetahui hotel ini berbintang lima dan memiliki tempat golf sendiri, sungguh dengan arsitektur dan interior yang indah - Terlihat sangat berbeda dengan hotel-hotel lain di Pekanbaru yang pernah saya tinggali. Namun semuanya langsung berubah ketika saya mencoba untuk check-in. Saya tidak yakin bagaimana cara menjelaskannya namun apapun yang anda pikir bisa buruk akan berjalan buruk. Tidak ada pengalaman hotel bintang 5 yang saya dapatkan.

1. Mereka tidak menyediakan American Express
2. Saya benar-benar diberikan kamar dengan kolam renang yang banyak puntung-puntung rokok di karpet dan saya mendapatkan handuk kolam sama dengan handuk kamar mandi.
3. Saya lalu pindah ke ruangan lain yang di lantai atas dan menemukan sebuah lemari esnya terkunci. Ketika saya menanyakan alasannya apa, mereka berkata memang begitu prosedurnya, hanya dibuka saat dipesan ramai-ramai dan saya hanya sendiri disana.
4. Ketika mereka menyediakan minibar, saya menemukan pilihannya sungguh buruk seperti hotel bintang 3.
5. Sarapan paginya benar-benar miskin pilihan makanan barat. Saya tidak dapat memasukkan roti saya ke pemanggang roti sampai mereka memasukkannya dengan roti yang lebih tipis. Sebagai tambahan, tidak ada selai yang baik. Saya diberikan yang banyak gula dan warnanya sangat kuat sebagai sebuah selai stroberi.
6. Ketika saya kenbali ke ruangan setelah makan siang di hari kedua dari 3 hari saya disana, kartu untuk masuk kekamar tidak berfungsi baik. Saya komplain pada staf kamar dan dia hanya menjawab sudah diluar jam keluar. Dibutuhkan beberapa waktu lagi untuk mendapatkan kembali kartu yang baru.
7. Saya percaya bahwa hotel ini kekurangan staf dan layanannya sangat lambat.

Pengalaman menginap disini sangat mengecewakan. Saya lebih baik menginap di tempat lain yang berbintang 4 atau 3 selama di Pekanbaru
title: Semuanya yang bisa berjalan buruk ternyata memang berjalan buruk

text:
Labersa merupakan salah satu hotel terbaik yang berlokasi di Pekanbaru. Kamar-kamarnya masih baru dan bersih dibandingkan dengan yang lainnya. Merupakan keputusan yang baik untuk tinggal di Labersa. Anda bisa melakukan golf dan juga terdapat water park, yang dioperasikan oleh Labersa sendiri. Tidak diragukan lagi Labersa menjual atmosfir yang baik disini. Satu-satunya kekurangan dari Labersa adalah lokasinya. Labersa merupakan hotel yang terjauh (dari semua top hotel di Pekanbaru) dari pusat kota. Sekitar 30-40 menit perjalanan tergantung lalu lintas. Pekanbaru tidak sama jika dibandingkan dengan Jakarta, sejam atau lebih dalam perjalanan di Jakarta sudah biasa. Tapi jika anda mencari tempat jauh yang bagus untuk beristirahat dan bersantai, Anda sudah memilih hotel yang tepat. 

Sebagai informasi, kamar-kamarnya merupakan yang terbaik dibandingkan dengan yang lainnya (yang juga berlokasi di Pekanbaru) superior dengan superior, deluxe dengan deluxe, secara langsung. Lagipula, harga hote di Pekanbaru tergolong relatif murah. Untuk hotel yang bagus ini hanya menghabiskan 500 ribu - 800 ribu pastikan Anda memesan sebelum menginap. Pelanggan yang datang tanpa memesan akan dikenakan biaya yang sangat mahal, yang tentu saja dilakukan oleh semua hotel di planet ini.
title: Bagus, tapi terlalu jauh,

This is one of the hotel that you will go if you want get away from city crowd. The hotel located just outside Sudirman Road. Only took me 15 - 20 minutes from hotel to the city center by car, but the result is very relaxing.

The hotel surrounded by golf course, you will rarely hear engine sound in your room.

Breakfast is ok. with a lot of variants from Indonesian to Western.

But I suggest that you have your own transport, because is hard to get taxi from the hotel.

For the room, the bathroom is big and nice. But the AC is centralized and we can't set the temperature. Is quite cold for me.

Overall is very nice hotel, and i prefer to stay here the next time I go to Pekanbaru

text:
I always love traveling... I can try all kind of hotel in the places where I went. This time I tried to stay at Labersa Hotel in Kampar - Riau. It is a 5 star hotel, which have golf facilities and also cottages.

I chose to stay at the Deluxe Elite room. The room size is around 34 sqm with a balcony so I can smoke outside of the room without disturbing the fresh air in the room also the view is straight to the golf course. The bed is comfortable, the AC in central with adjustable temperature.

I bet you’ll be surprise with the bath room. The size of it take 1/3 of total space... it’s huge and equipped with the bathtub also rain shower.... love it so much...

Thanks to Ms. Titi, the director of sales, who happens to be the manager in-charge when I stayed, she show’s me around to most of the facilities. This place is huge and very suitable for corporate events or any social events also for families, you don't have to worry that your kid might get bored. The hotel’s swimming pool is located at the second floor of the building and it’s an outdoor pool. But if you want to have some more fun with water, they have Water Park complete with the sliding and stuff in the complex…

The breakfast is good. They serve local traditional, national and also international foods.

So if you happened to be in Pekanbaru, Kampar is less than 30 minutes away, Labersa is the perfect weekend hibernation either solo or family.
title: Great place for weekend hibernation

First of all, the hotel is the only fine resort in the district.
It is underrated due to the location which is not exactly at the heart of the city, unlike other competitors.

However, it is actually not that far. It takes 15 minutes from the city center to reach. Not too distant by standard of big cities' people.

Room was clean, sheets were rather old, but still clean and tidy, not smelly.
Water pressure was good with functional heater.

It has 2 big swimming pool, located separately. One is for family pool, supposedly loved by the kids, and the other one is for like real swimming.

It has nice restaurant - a Chinese restaurant, again, very underrated, but For me it is considerably amongst the best restaurants in the whole city.

Granted its more serene location, it should be a relaxing place to getaway from the bustles of the city and just to simply relax.

Cons : Nothing that I can find. (yet)

Location :

I'll be visiting again, so I can give a more in-depth review on the other facilities they have.. since my visit yesterday was purely to get some sleep.

text:
Pekanbaru can be stiflingly hot. Everywhere you go its almost as if the heat and stickiness just clings to you. 

You can almost escape the heat when you drop into one their many new malls however if you happen to come by this growing city, you MUST NOT miss the lush cool greens of the Labersa Golf Course within the complex of the Labersa Grand Hotel and Convention Center, situated barely 15 minutes from the Airport and minutes to the main stretch of Jl. Jend. Sudirman road. 

If we had to stay in the grounds of Labersa for our entire trip we'd still have plenty to do! The hotel, while still privately owned and managed definitely earns its 5 Star rating with the rooms that it provides, the variety of restaurants and food on offer (breakfast was amazingly good! - more below). The hotel as mentioned has its own 18 hole golf course complete with separate driving range. There are even villas and cottages available for the avid golfer to wake up right near the greens. Their main pool while small, was still sufficient to provide a brief respite from the morning heat after breakfast for many people and children. 

As I mentioned breakfast, this is a fitting time to describe the surprises. For a small town, Labersa Hotel really does a great service to Pekanbaru because being 5 star, local residents as well as outsiders are treated to really top notch service and truly 5 star foods! For example, their egg station was complete and chefs were ready to serve a number of hungry guests, quickly and efficiently. They had the waffle station nearby for those eager for a sweet ending. There was even some sushi available which to be honest would seem quite a rare find in this town - so, well done to the FnB team for providing such an option for a breakfast buffet. 

I must say the hardest part of trips you go with other friends and families is actually being able to get some good holiday rest because someone, somewhere ALWAYS wants to do something and wants to make sure at least more than half of the group also do it! So it was good and refreshing to have been able to get a decent sleep and wake up refreshed for morning runs I like.

On top of all this, there's a Theme Park and Water Park situated just right outside near the main entrance to the Hotel called Riau Fantasi, with Go Karting and a Paintball field available! Talk about fun for EVERYONE.

We all truly had a blast and for sure, if I happen to visit again or had friends and associates going to Pekanbaru, without a doubt Labersa Grand Hotel and Convention Center would be top of the list.

*Special info: the hotels exterior and main lobby interior resembles a grand cruise ship - a delight for any cruise ship enthusiasts I'm sure.
title: The Oasis of Pekanbaru

text:
Located on the outskirts of Pekanbaru, the Labersa Grand Hotel and Convention center is actually more than just a Hotel. 5 star set up and better than 4 star prices, sitting on a Championship quality Golf Course, what more could you ask for.

There is a Theme park and a small Water park which was great for the family: they were happy and was I, feasting on this tremendous golf course.

The Hotel is predominantly used by local people and as such the food choices reflect this; however, the staff were more than willing to make what ever you wanted, with a little bit of direction.

Huge bathroom with huge bath tub and huge rain shower: what a pity that there wasn't  a shoulder shower to go with it. Very comfortable beds and air-conditioning that worked.

I didn't feel the need to have to go into town but the Hotel had "transport" available at all times which meant that it wasn't really too far. 

This is more than just a Hotel: it's a quality experience and great for getting the family away form the bustle of Jakarta: I would highly recommend that when in Pekanbaru, you give this Hotel a try.
title: A class family resort in every sense of the word

text:
This is a hotel next to a golf course, which means it is pretty far out from the main town centre. As a plus it is pretty close to the airport. 

The rooms are actually quite nice, and the bathroom huge.
A minor issue with the rain shower head not quite working, but as there is a tub and hand held shower unit, this is not too much of an issue. 

Internet is complimentary and is accessed by cable only, but note they can run out of the cables. However they will normally provide you with an internet pre-paid access account if you insist for internet connection, so keep this in mind. 

Service seems a little slow at the front desk - but it's not that busy a hotel, so it shouldn't affect your experience too much. 

Overall, not bad, but could be better.
title: Decent hotel, but make sure you have a car

text:
Me and my family stayed at this hotel on August 9, 2013 with a plan to stay 2 nights. But when I first came I was already getting a bad impression for this hotel.
First, the absence of a bell boy who welcomed the guests (maybe the second day of the Eid, many staff are off).
Secondly, there is not one staff person who offered to take my luggage to the room and FO staff just gave a room key with little explanation lies my room on the 3rd floor, that's all.
Third, this makes me very disappointed. At night around 9 pm I ordered food through room service for my family. Half an hour passed food my order has not come, and I call room service food is said to come soon. The next half hour is yet to come also order my food, I call back service to the room was the same answer that my order promptly delivered to the room. Until 12 o'clock at night the food I order is not also up to the room.
Finally I decided to move hotels the next day. I recommend not to stay here than too far from the city and service to the guests do not like a five star hotel.
If possible to review the provision of hospitality association predicate for a five star hotel.

text:
Best hotel in pekanbaru for those who love to play golf and get off from city. Its better if you have vehicle because its very far from city (Takes 45 minute to Ciputra Mall). Judging from the outside i expect at least 100 usd/nite hotel, actually its started from 50 usd/nite and  you will get 2 voucher discount 50% on Labersa Waterpark.

The room and bathroom design i think its the best in pekanbaru, and this is the only hotel in pekanbaru that has bathtub (Regular room), you could relax on bathtub looking at scenery from large windows.

The carpet is dirty and smelly, the smell of cigarette on carpet and bed makes me feel dizzy (I dont like cigarette smoke).

I were on 4th floor, i dont understand how flies get in my room. I took 3 rooms for my family and all those rooms have flies on it.

I think for the breakfast, Premiere Hotel and Jatra Hotel are better than Labersa. The restaurant is small, hard to find seat on breakfast time, employees are not responsive to clean the table, they look confused seeing alot off people, I need to ask them to clean the table. I ask boiled egg, and get it 45 minutes later.

I was dissapointed. I'm sure if the service is good and the room is clean, everybody willing to pay more to stay in this hotel.
title: Do not expect too much

To cut it short, if you plan for a relaxing stay in Pekanbaru, this is the hotel.

It's a resort-style hotel with a nice pool. Surrounding area includes club house with big swimming pool, water park, and the best golf course in the area.

Room is big with good amenities. Breakfast is the best I've tried in Pekanbaru. Services is great as well. The location main downside of the hotel, a little far from the city, so you need to have your own car.

In all, highly recommended hotel for business and pleasure in Pekanbaru.

text:
Frequently come to this hotel but still like it. The hotel is simply the best hotel in pekanbaru, in term of hotel quality, comfort, restaurant, attraction in hotel (Golf, Waterpark, Themepark). The bathroom is probably the largest bathroom I've ever seen with large bathtub (well, the bathtub has window to see outside).

Pros:
1. Super nice room; well maintained
2. Always looks new 
3. Foods are great, and cheap also (comparing with other hotels in its class)
4. Unparalleled attractions : Golf course, Theme park, Waterpark
5. Bathroom 
6. Perfect choice; as long as you don't plan to go somewhere else in pekanbaru 
7. Near the airport

Cons:
1. Location is like 6 miles from the nearest mainroad. And no public transport (except taxi).

Tips:
1. There is a shuttle to mall if you can match your schedule
2. Pick a room with balcony
3. For $10, you can get 'all you can eat' dinner at saturday night : Seafoods, steaks, oriental foods, etc... you name it
4. Night shop at bakery shop for incredibly low price : 4 pack of large breads for only $1
title: Perfect getaway in Pekanbaru

text: We booked the Ambassador suite (Rp2,8mil/night).  Service in the lobby was great and it was down hill from there.  The room was dirty; the carpets and furniture stained.  The slippers in the closet looked worn by a previous occupant.  Shower didn't work, dirty tubs in the bathrooms.  But!!  All of this could have been overlooked were it not for the horrible room service.  An hour after we ordered, the food that arrived was all wrong- and cold.  I called the manager and he came to the room.  He took the order again and another hour later, the food arrived....cold again and wrong, but we didn't care any longer.  Room service is about 33% of the value of our stays in a hotel- mess that up and we're never going back.  Well, we're not going back to the Labersa.  The golf and water park areas appeared to still be under construction and the whole place gave me the feeling of an American suburb development that only has a few model homes set up.  I would recommend the Aryaduta or The Premier hotels closer to town.
title: First time will be our last time
